verses.verse: And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> men <S%H120><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> to multiply <S%H7231><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth, <S%H127><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> unto them,

That the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H2007><s%> were fair; <S%H2896><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> them wives <S%H802><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they chose. <S%H977><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> My spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> always <S%H5769><s%> strive <S%H1777><s%> with man, <S%H120><s%> for that he <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1571><s%> is flesh: <S%H1320><s%> yet his days <S%H3117><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

There were <S%H1961><s%> giants <S%H5303><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that, <S%H3651><s%> when <S%H834><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> and they bore <S%H3205><s%> children to them, the same <S%H1992><s%> became mighty men <S%H1368><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were of old, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of renown. <S%H8034><s%>

And GOD <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> was great <S%H7227><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and that every <S%H3605><s%> imagination <S%H3336><s%> of the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of his heart <S%H3820><s%> was only <S%H7535><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> continually. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And it repented <S%H5162><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> man <S%H120><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it grieved <S%H6087><s%> him at <S%H413><s%> his heart. <S%H3820><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will destroy <S%H4229><s%> <S%H853><s%> man <S%H120><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have created <S%H1254><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth; <S%H127><s%> both man, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H120><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> the creeping thing, <S%H7431><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the air; <S%H8064><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it repenteth <S%H5162><s%> me that <S%H3588><s%> I have made <S%H6213><s%> them.
But Noah <S%H5146><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Noah: <S%H5146><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> a just <S%H6662><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and perfect <S%H8549><s%> in his generations, <S%H1755><s%> and Noah <S%H5146><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H854><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> begot <S%H3205><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H853><s%> Shem, <S%H8035><s%> <S%H853><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth. <S%H3315><s%>
The earth <S%H776><s%> also was corrupt <S%H7843><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with violence. <S%H2555><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> looked upon <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was corrupt; <S%H7843><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> had corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Noah, <S%H5146><s%> The end <S%H7093><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me; for <S%H3588><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with violence <S%H2555><s%> through them; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will destroy <S%H7843><s%> them with <S%H854><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Make <S%H6213><s%> thee an ark <S%H8392><s%> of gopher <S%H1613><s%> wood; <S%H6086><s%> rooms <S%H7064><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> in the ark, <S%H8392><s%> and shalt pitch <S%H3722><s%> it within <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> and without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> with pitch. <S%H3724><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> is the fashion which <S%H834><s%> thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> it of: The length <S%H753><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> shall be three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the height <S%H6967><s%> of it thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>

A window <S%H6672><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> to the ark, <S%H8392><s%> and in <S%H413><s%> a cubit <S%H520><s%> shalt thou finish <S%H3615><s%> it above; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> and the door <S%H6607><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> shalt thou set <S%H7760><s%> in the side <S%H6654><s%> thereof; with lower, <S%H8482><s%> second, <S%H8145><s%> and third <S%H7992><s%> stories shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> it.

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I, even I, <S%H589><s%> do bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> a flood <S%H3999><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> is the breath <S%H7307><s%> of life, <S%H2416><s%> from under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and every thing <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the earth <S%H776><s%> shall die. <S%H1478><s%>

But with <S%H854><s%> thee will I establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant; <S%H1285><s%> and thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and thy sons, <S%H1121><s%> and thy wife, <S%H802><s%> and thy sons' <S%H1121><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee.

And of every <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> living thing <S%H2416><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of every <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> sort shalt thou bring <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> to keep them alive <S%H2421><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee; they shall be <S%H1961><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female. <S%H5347><s%>

Of fowls <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5775><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> of every <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> of every <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> sort shall come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, to keep them alive. <S%H2421><s%>

And take <S%H3947><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> unto thee of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> food <S%H3978><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is eaten, <S%H398><s%> and thou shalt gather <S%H622><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> thee; and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> for food <S%H402><s%> for thee, and for them.
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> Noah; <S%H5146><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> he.
